competitive_edges.title: Our competitive edges

description: T2 Soft is a Vietnamese SI and IT outsourcing company that provides software development and maintenance, and IT consulting services for Korean corporate clients. We aim to quickly provide high-quality IT solutions optimized for customer needs, successfully support digital transformation, and grow together with our customers.
description_mobile: T2 Soft is a Vietnamese SI and IT outsourcing company that provides software development and maintenance, and IT consulting services for Korean corporate clients.

focus_industries.description: T2 Soft leverages extensive project experience and technical expertise across various industries to deliver customized IT solutions. We work hand-in-hand with our clients to maximize business value, driving both efficiency and innovation.
focus_industries.title: Focused Industries

service.ai_desc: Intelligent solutions that leverage the power of AI and ML to drive insights and automation.
service.cloud_desc: Cloud architecture, migration, and management services to optimize your infrastructure and operations.
service.custom_software_desc: Bespoke software solutions designed and built from the ground up to address your specific business challenges and requirements
service.mobile_app_desc: Native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences across all devices.
service.qa_desc: Comprehensive quality assurance and testing services to ensure your software meets the highest standards.
service.slogan: Your global software service and solution partner
service.web_dev_desc: Responsive, high-performance web applications and sites built with the latest technologies and frameworks.

why_vietnam.title: Why Vietnam?
why_vietnam.description: Vietnam provides an ideal outsourcing environment for global companies, offering skilled IT talent, competitive costs, fast technology adoption, and reliable development services.

talent.title: Skilled talent & technology strength
talent.description: A rich pool of young IT talent in foreign languages & quick to adopt new technologies

cost.title: High cost efficiency
cost.description: Access top-tier development talent at 25–55% lower cost than local teams – ideal for budget optimization

geo_n_culture.title: Strong geographical & cultural alignment
geo_n_culture.description: Professional, respectful & hardworking culture— well-aligned with global collaboration styles

politic_n_eco.title: Political & economic stable environment
politic_n_eco.description: Vietnam offers a secure & predictable environment for longterm outsourcing partnerships.

experience.title: Global experience
experience.description: Proven experience collaborating with global enterprises from KR, JP and beyond

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: T2, Shaping the Future of Technology We strive to be your premier global development partner, leading the advancement of next-generation technologies.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We provide reliable software development and solutions to clients worldwide, offering highquality and cost-effective services with Vietnam’s top tech talent. Through technological innovation and flexible collaboration, we help our clients grow their businesses..

values.title: Values
values.description: We collaborate closely with our clients as one unified team, embrace next-generation technologies to stay ahead, and foster long-term partnerships built on trust, transparency, and accountability.

tech_stack.description: Our comprehensive technology expertise spans across modern frameworks, languages, and platforms. We leverage cutting-edge tools to build scalable, robust, and innovative solutions.
